comment: MINIMAL ReasoningBank Integration - Lightweight version for testing

hooks.comment: Quick pattern query before editing (2-6ms overhead)
hooks.command: cat | jq -r '.tool_input.file_path // .tool_input.path // empty' | xargs -I {} bash -c 'npx claude-flow@alpha memory query "{}" --reasoningbank --limit 2 2>&1 | grep -q "Found" && echo "üìö ReasoningBank: Found patterns" >&2 || true'

cat | jq -r '.tool_input.file_path // .tool_input.path // empty' | xargs -I {} bash -c 'FILE="{}"; [ -f "$FILE" ] && npx claude-flow@alpha memory store "edit_$(basename $FILE)_$(date +%s)" "Edited: $FILE" --namespace code --reasoningbank --confidence 0.5 2>/dev/null && echo "üíæ Pattern stored" >&2 || true'
bash -c 'echo "üß† Consolidating ReasoningBank..."; npx claude-flow@alpha memory consolidate --reasoningbank 2>/dev/null && echo "‚úÖ Memory consolidated" || echo "‚ö†Ô∏è Consolidation skipped"'
